## Overview

The `scores_radar()`function renders a radar chart for comparing eval scores across multiple models and metrics.

```{python}
from inspect_viz import Data
from inspect_viz.view.beta import scores_radar

evals = Data.from_file("writing_bench_radar.parquet")
scores_radar(evals)
```
